name: UI
description: UI is knowing the patterns that make an interface usable and familiar to the users, and the ability to make it look good.

name: Photoshop
description: I have been working with Adobe Photoshop for at least 10 years, so I have extensive knowledge of the software.

name: Illustrator
description: My workflow involves using Illustrator in all the vector artworks such as logos and icons

name: Indesign
description: I use Indesign when I need a presentation that makes a good impression.

name: After Effects
description: I use after effects for interaction design and animations.

name: Icon Design
description: Pixel perfect vector icon design that loooks sharp on the browser

name: Flat Design
description: I love simplicity and flat design is more than just a fade.

name: HTML 5
description: Semantic and clean HTML 5 markup. I  work with accessibility in mind.

name: CSS 3
description: Organized Cascade style sheets using the latest conventions like BEM or atomic CSS.

name: SASS
description: SASS is my preprocessor of choice, I prefer to keep it light with only the bare minimum of variables and mixins to help theming

name: Javascript
description: My programming language of choice, I love JS, you can easily find me in conventions near Bologna.

name: React
description: My library of choice for quick prototyping and modular development.

name: AngularJS
description: My framework of choice for more complex web applications.

name: Mockup
description: With quick mockups I can bring your project to life. This helps you be on the same page with your clients and your development team.
hint: I can help you quickly bring your project to a tangible form you can show to your clients.

name: Prototyping
description: Prototypes help you visualize the application flow, it's essential to spot any usability issue early on your project.

name: UX
description: Everything is UX, I'll help you polish your user flows and your personas with simplicity in mind.
